text: Kim Seon-ho (; born May 8, 1986) is a South Korean actor who began his career on stage. He made his screen debut in 2017 with Good Manager. He gained fame with the television series Start-Up (2020) and Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha (2021), which were aired on tvN and Netflix respectively. == Early years and education == Kim was an only child who grew up in Bongcheon-dong, Seoul. As a child, he experienced a traumatic incident when his mother was stabbed during a home robbery. He was able to overcome this trauma through acting, thanks to an acting academy he attended during his third year of high school. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Seoul Category:South Korean stage actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean movie actors
title: Kim Seon-ho
